title: Gold Prices in Pakistan Witness Historic Single - Day Drop
description: Karachi – Gold prices in Pakistan recorded a massive decline on Friday as the rate of 24-karat gold plunged by Rs35,500 per tola, marking one of the steepest single-day falls in the local bullion market in recent years.
